title: Question 1
prompt: Sharon drove 63.6 miles to her mother’s house. She drove her mother 8.2 miles to a restaurant and the same distance back to her mother’s house. From her mother’s house she drove 64.4 miles to a grocery store and then 2.6 miles to her house. How far did Sharon drive?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
To find the total distance, add all of the distances that Sharon drove. The total is 147 miles.

Sharon drove 63.6 miles to her mother’s house. She drove her mother 8.2 miles to a restaurant and the same distance back to her mother’s house. From her mother’s house she drove 64.4 miles to a grocery store and then 2.6 miles to her house. How far did Sharon drive?

63.6+8.2+8.2+64.4+2.6=147 miles
